summary: Use this API to get Shop level info - i
description: Use this API to get Shop level info - i.e. seller's toggle status is on/off

query.name: item_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

query.name: input_keyword
query.description: The keyword seller typed in the manually add keyword window.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/ads/get_keyword_rcmd_keyword?access_token=access_token&input_keyword=keyword&item_id=1111&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=12312&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error code, empty when no error returned

schema.name: warning
schema.description: If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: request id is unique for each request

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

schema.name: input_keyword
schema.description: The keyword seller typed in the manually add keyword window.

schema.name: keyword
schema.description: Keyword value (Only return the highly recommended keywords, will be sightly different from Seller Center)

schema.name: quality_score
schema.description: This is a measure of how attractive your ad is and its relevance to the keyword. The higher the quality score, the higher your ad rank. Ad rank is based on this score and your bid price.

schema.name: search_volume
schema.description: The number of times the keyword has been searched on Shopee in the last 30 days. The larger the search volume, the more impressions your ad will receive.

schema.name: suggested_bid
schema.description: This is bid price suggested by Shopee algorithm for the keyword in local currency.

error_codes.message: The information you queried is not found.
Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.
Item doesn't belong to the shop.
Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.
Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.
Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.
